body: @JaxSon because she didn't have an easy name to translate she actually had doujins under the tag "Cojanskaya" before her name was officially translated the amount is lacking but there are some very solid doujins there
100M QP for Koyanchihuahua is a steal

You would think a character like Koyanskaya would have a ton of doujins, she's popular, important to the main story and really hot, but no she only has a handful, and I thought becoming playable and getting two different versions would fix this but no, still a low number of doujins and the stuff that did come out are complete garbage besides the paizuri stuff, like what the fuck?
